name: Addition
description:
In order to avoid silly mistakes
As a math idiot
I want to be told the sum of two numbers

elements.name: Adding several numbers

steps.name: I have entered 60 into the calculator
I have entered 70 into the calculator
I have entered 130 into the calculator
the result should be 260 on the screen

elements.name: Adding several numbers

steps.name: I have entered 40 into the calculator
I have entered 50 into the calculator
I have entered 90 into the calculator
the result should be 180 on the screen

elements.name: Add two numbers

steps.name: I have entered 1 into the calculator
I have entered 2 into the calculator
the result should be 3 on the screen

elements.name: Fail to add two numbers

steps.name: I have entered 1 into the calculator
I have entered 2.2 into the calculator
the result should be 3.2 on the screen

elements.name: Not automated adding two numbers

name: Scenarios With Special Characters
description: Here we demonstrate usage of special characters in scenario names

elements.name: This is a scenario with parentheses, hyphen and comma (10-20, 30-40)

steps.name: I have entered 50 into the calculator
I have entered 70 into the calculator
the result should be 120 on the screen

elements.name: This is a scenario outline with parentheses, hyphen and comma (10-20, 30-40)
This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '**'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '++'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '.*'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '[]'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '{}'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '()'

elements.name: This scenario contains examples with Regex-special characters

steps.name: I have special characters for regexes in the value, for example a '^.*(?<foo>BAR)\s[^0-9]{3,4}A+$'
